TopicTitle: I need help with flight controls

Articles.Content:
When trying to construct a space plane I am unable to attach the ailerons, elevators, rudder, etc. I haven\'t downloaded any add-ons for Kerbal on my laptop. Everytime i try to attach them to the aft side of a flight surface they will try to attach opposite to the surface. I.E. a horizontal wing/the flight control will always try to attach Vertically. I have cycled the options for attaching object and nothing works. If i DO manage at some point to get it the same way, I.E. horizontal/horizontal, it will attach inside the wing.

Am i missing something?
Use WASDQ and E to rotate parts.
